Who Is This For? Our packages are perfect for businesses or professionals who want to establish an online presence quickly. Whether you‚Äôre unsure of your project's final look or need something running immediately, our tiers offer the flexibility to make changes later.

Development ‚Äã

If the project does not foresee a drastic change in the future in terms of features and complexity, we will use Static Site Generators to fulfill this.

Our team will decide what platform is suitable based on the information we exchange so that it is still scalable.

Care Plan ‚Äã

Pricing starts from S$40 per month

  • Free 1-year domain name
    Renews at S$25 per year for regular TLD
    Renews at S$65 per year for country ccTLD
  • Free 1 custom e-mail for one year
    Renews at S$14/m per user
  • Access to Client Dashboard
    A portal for you to have an overview of your services with us
  • E-Mail Only Support
  • Shared Hosting or Serverless: Hostinger, Vercel, Netlify
